Description: Regular monthly meeting of the Board of Assessors to review property assessments and address public concerns.
Regular meeting of the Select Board to discuss town business and policy matters.
Monthly meeting to review applications for changes to properties within the historic district.
Regular meeting to review development proposals and zoning matters.
Regular meeting of the School Committee to discuss educational policies and budget matters.
Meeting to review wetland protection applications and conservation matters.
Regular meeting to review town budget and financial matters.
Monthly meeting to address public health concerns and regulations.
Meeting to plan recreational activities and review facility usage.
Committee meeting to discuss business development initiatives and economic growth strategies.
Meeting to review grant applications and plan cultural events for the community.
Monthly meeting to oversee library operations and policies.
Regular meeting to discuss public works projects and infrastructure maintenance.
Public hearing for variance and special permit applications.
Committee meeting to discuss affordable housing initiatives and policies.
